description: two prints, taped together at back horizontally; top print: open book on background of weathered wood and stones; elderly woman's head at L; lobster claw taped onto text at R; bottom print: open book on background of dry leaves and fish parts; female faces and text on pages; sticks glued onto image around LLC of top image
marks:
Signature, inscription and mark
Between images in Along R edge of top image, in white script: [Peter
title: Untitled.  Diary Diptych
